item.title: How to take control of your medical records
item.description: Theres no master patient identifier to ensure all your records are linked back to you, says Dr. Harlan Krumholz, a cardiologist and director of the Center for Outcomes Research and Evaluation at the Yale School of Medicine. The only way to ensure you have all your health records, he says, is to compile them yourself. Read on marketwatch.com
